item.title: Database Project Assignment - Business Data Management
item.description: BSYS602: Business Data Management - Workshop Individual Assignment 3 - A+ level Below is the Workshop Individual Assignment 3 for the BSYS602 paper. If the preview does not work, click the link here. Summary This project involved Analysing a case study and its business rules to design a Entity Relationship Diagram (in 2nd normal form) Describing the normalisation process, normalising the ERD to 3rd normal form Constructing SQL queries for the hypothetical database Case Study for Database Project Assignment “Nature-Oriented Scenic Tours (NOST) provides guided tours to groups of visitors to NZâ€™s North Island.
